content: this little bag is intended to fit one set of standard tabletop dice but its size can easily be adjusted both in width and height instructions in the pattern it can be made from any yarn weight and fiber - great for stashbusting or using up scrap yarn note the meterage/yardage listed above is for a bag without size modifications in dk weight yarn to make the bag you will need * yarn any yarn can be used for this pattern the sample bag in the picture uses about 20 g / 46 m 0 7 oz / 50 yd of a dk weight cotton yarn * crochet hook of the recommended size for the yarn or slightly smaller the sample uses a 3 5 mm hook us size e * tapestry needle * scissors * optional stitch marker or piece of scrap yarn to mark the beginning of the round the bag is crocheted in continuous rounds making heavy use of puff stitches the pattern download comes with a low vision version of this pattern written in 24 point sans serif font calibri in all black text on white background with no italics there are no charts in either version of the pattern
